thread.title: Northern Ireland's Kyle Lafferty Can't Wait to Play against Lionel Messi at Euro 2016
thread.title_full: Northern Ireland's Kyle Lafferty Can't Wait to Play against Lionel Messi at Euro 2016 | Complex UK

author: Corey Pellatt
title: Northern Ireland's Kyle Lafferty Can't Wait to Play against Lionel Messi at Euro 2016
text:
Northern Ireland players have every right to be happy.
The football minnows finished top of their qualification group for Euro 2016, which means that a team boasting talents like Shane Ferguson, Craig Cathcart and Paddy McNair could line up against the likes of Germany, Italy or France next summer.
Northern Irish talisman, Kyle Lafferty, stunned reporters and viewers when he revealed that he was excited to play against "Lionel Messi and Neymar" of Argentina and Brazil in the EUROPEAN championships. If you don't know what's wrong with that, you're in the wrong place.
We're pretty certain Lafferty was just trolling the reporter. Because he pulled out a 'WHAT ARE TH SE?' on live TV just a few minutes later.
[via Twitter ]
